text: Robin Leon Koch (; born 17 July 1996) is a German professional footballer who plays as a centre back or defensive midfielder for Bundesliga club Eintracht Frankfurt and the Germany national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Eintracht Trier 2014–15 Regionalliga Südwest 23 2 0 0 — 23 2 Eintracht Trier II 2014–15 Rheinlandliga 6 0 — — 6 0 1\.
